origin_dialogue: Ah, top of the mornin' to ya, ma'am.
translated_dialogue: Ah, top of the mornin' to ya, ma'am.

origin_dialogue: And good day to you, Officer O'Lungfish. How are you today?
translated_dialogue: And good day to you, Officer O'Lungfish. How are you today?

origin_dialogue: Oh, damp and happy. Can't complain! And what are you and the wee one up to on this lovely day?
translated_dialogue: Oh, damp and happy. Can't complain! And what are you and the wee one up to on this lovely day?

origin_dialogue: Oh, just obeying the law as always. All posted directives followed to the letter.
translated_dialogue: Oh, just obeying the law as always. All posted directives followed to the letter.

origin_dialogue: Ah, good to hear! Not a one of us want any trouble that's for sure!
translated_dialogue: Ah, good to hear! Not a one of us want any trouble that's for sure!

origin_dialogue: Fine! Take control of this freaky toad! I don't need him to nab children for me anymore!
translated_dialogue: Fine! Take control of this freaky toad! I don't need him to nab children for me anymore!

origin_dialogue: I've got the brain of a little girl back in my lab that's strong enough to power a whole army of Psychoblaster Death Tanks!
translated_dialogue: I've got the brain of a little girl back in my lab that's strong enough to power a whole army of Psychoblaster Death Tanks!

origin_dialogue: You've got the brain of a little girl! Ha ha ha!
translated_dialogue: You've got the brain of a little girl! Ha ha ha!

origin_dialogue: I think you've got the muscles of a little girl, too.
translated_dialogue: I think you've got the muscles of a little girl, too.

origin_dialogue: Hey everyone, here comes Kochamara! No, wait, it's Goggalor. RUN!
translated_dialogue: Hey everyone, here comes Kochamara! No, wait, it's Goggalor. RUN!

origin_dialogue: Go back to your watery hell, Goggalor!
translated_dialogue: Go back to your watery hell, Goggalor!

origin_dialogue: Nooooooooooo! Not the natural history museum!
translated_dialogue: Nooooooooooo! Not the natural history museum!

origin_dialogue: Oh no, Goggalor's heading for the orphanage!
translated_dialogue: Oh no, Goggalor's heading for the orphanage!

origin_dialogue: It's okay everyone. Goggalor missed the orphanage!
translated_dialogue: It's okay everyone. Goggalor missed the orphanage!

origin_dialogue: No wait he's still heading for the orphanage!
translated_dialogue: No wait he's still heading for the orphanage!

origin_dialogue: Oh no, it was the orphanage--for dogs. It was the puppy orphanage everyone!
translated_dialogue: Oh no, it was the orphanage--for dogs. It was the puppy orphanage everyone!

origin_dialogue: It was just a mattress factory.
translated_dialogue: It was just a mattress factory.

origin_dialogue: Ahhhhh, my mattress factory! I'm ruined!
translated_dialogue: Ahhhhh, my mattress factory! I'm ruined!

origin_dialogue: Good lord, he's impervious to bullets and love!
translated_dialogue: Good lord, he's impervious to bullets and love!

origin_dialogue: Why doesn't the Navy electrocute him?
translated_dialogue: Why doesn't the Navy electrocute him?

origin_dialogue: I don't want to complain, but Kochamara should do something.
translated_dialogue: I don't want to complain, but Kochamara should do something.

origin_dialogue: Holy smokes, those goggles are five thousand meters tall!
translated_dialogue: Holy smokes, those goggles are five thousand meters tall!

origin_dialogue: You're lucky we can't own guns, Goggalor!
translated_dialogue: You're lucky we can't own guns, Goggalor!

origin_dialogue: We've faced monsters like you before, Goggalor, only much smaller.
translated_dialogue: We've faced monsters like you before, Goggalor, only much smaller.

origin_dialogue: Excuse me, were you talking to me?
translated_dialogue: Excuse me, were you talking to me?

origin_dialogue: Don't worry, every member of the resistance is prepared to die fighting the tyranny of Kochamara.
translated_dialogue: Don't worry, every member of the resistance is prepared to die fighting the tyranny of Kochamara.

origin_dialogue: He's a giant monster like you, Goggalor. He brainwashed and enslaved almost everyone in Lungfishopolis.
translated_dialogue: He's a giant monster like you, Goggalor. He brainwashed and enslaved almost everyone in Lungfishopolis.

origin_dialogue: That stinks. So hey, have you seen any other humans around here? I'm looking for a girl called Lili.
translated_dialogue: That stinks. So hey, have you seen any other humans around here? I'm looking for a girl called Lili.

origin_dialogue: The government archives might have some information about your young girlfriend, Goggalor.
translated_dialogue: The government archives might have some information about your young girlfriend, Goggalor.

origin_dialogue: I don't know if she's really my girlfriend. I mean, I think she--
translated_dialogue: I don't know if she's really my girlfriend. I mean, I think she--

origin_dialogue: I only meant that she is your friend who is a girl, Goggalor. To access the archives, we must first destroy the broadcast tower Kochamara uses to control the populace.
translated_dialogue: I only meant that she is your friend who is a girl, Goggalor. To access the archives, we must first destroy the broadcast tower Kochamara uses to control the populace.

origin_dialogue: Check. I'll go smash that, then.
translated_dialogue: Check. I'll go smash that, then.

origin_dialogue: Wait, Goggalor! In order to reach the tower, you'll need to pass through that wall of lasers. But you'll never make it through the lasers without our help.
translated_dialogue: Wait, Goggalor! In order to reach the tower, you'll need to pass through that wall of lasers. But you'll never make it through the lasers without our help.

origin_dialogue: So are you gonna start helping soon?
translated_dialogue: So are you gonna start helping soon?

origin_dialogue: First, I need you to do something for the resistance. Punch a hole in that prison and free my comrades!
translated_dialogue: First, I need you to do something for the resistance. Punch a hole in that prison and free my comrades!

origin_dialogue: Hooyah! Now how about getting me past those gates?
translated_dialogue: Hooyah! Now how about getting me past those gates?

origin_dialogue: Right. We stole this shield power module from Kochamara. It's too big for any of us to operate, but it should work for you.
translated_dialogue: Right. We stole this shield power module from Kochamara. It's too big for any of us to operate, but it should work for you.

origin_dialogue: Hey, is this gonna upset Kochamara and all your little brainwashed neighbors?
translated_dialogue: Hey, is this gonna upset Kochamara and all your little brainwashed neighbors?

origin_dialogue: So knocking down the prison and then breaking this laser shield thing--nobody's gonna get mad about that and start shooting at me?
translated_dialogue: So knocking down the prison and then breaking this laser shield thing--nobody's gonna get mad about that and start shooting at me?

origin_dialogue: But what is even an entire navy of Lungfish against the might and revolutionary zeal of Goggalor!
translated_dialogue: But what is even an entire navy of Lungfish against the might and revolutionary zeal of Goggalor!

origin_dialogue: Meet us at the dam, Goggalor. FOR FREEDOM!
translated_dialogue: Meet us at the dam, Goggalor. FOR FREEDOM!

origin_dialogue: Goggalor, come in! We have commandeered these vessels in your name!
translated_dialogue: Goggalor, come in! We have commandeered these vessels in your name!

origin_dialogue: We can put them in position to help you cross Kochamara Channel, to get to Kochamara Island, and destroy Kochamara Tower!
translated_dialogue: We can put them in position to help you cross Kochamara Channel, to get to Kochamara Island, and destroy Kochamara Tower!

origin_dialogue: The thing is that, uh, although you have had SEVERAL excellent plans today, Goggalor... We... Uh
translated_dialogue: The thing is that, uh, although you have had SEVERAL excellent plans today, Goggalor... We... Uh

origin_dialogue: Er, we just think it best, uh... to... er uh
translated_dialogue: Er, we just think it best, uh... to... er uh

origin_dialogue: We've decided to maintain our position out here.
translated_dialogue: We've decided to maintain our position out here.

origin_dialogue: Just until you clear the area of all hostiles.
translated_dialogue: Just until you clear the area of all hostiles.

origin_dialogue: The peaceful city of Lungfishopolis is under attack tonight by a hideous, gigantic monster the terrified citizens have named, "Goggalor."
translated_dialogue: The peaceful city of Lungfishopolis is under attack tonight by a hideous, gigantic monster the terrified citizens have named, "Goggalor."

origin_dialogue: The navy has responded quickly and decisively, dispatching its entire tank division to neutralize the creature.
translated_dialogue: The navy has responded quickly and decisively, dispatching its entire tank division to neutralize the creature.

origin_dialogue: Soon, authorities say, everything will return to normal or better.
translated_dialogue: Soon, authorities say, everything will return to normal or better.

origin_dialogue: Well, things have gotten a little embarrassing for Goggalor. Recently surfaced information has strongly linked the previously intimidating monster with common lowlife criminals.
translated_dialogue: Well, things have gotten a little embarrassing for Goggalor. Recently surfaced information has strongly linked the previously intimidating monster with common lowlife criminals.

origin_dialogue: Earlier tonight, Goggalor broke some of his jailhouse cronies out of the slammer so they could enjoy a night on the town, popping pills, and soliciting inexpensive call girls.
translated_dialogue: Earlier tonight, Goggalor broke some of his jailhouse cronies out of the slammer so they could enjoy a night on the town, popping pills, and soliciting inexpensive call girls.

origin_dialogue: Well, they're in for one nasty hangover! Our beloved Navy has come up with a high-tech new invention: trucks armed with HYPER-ELECTRICITY!!!
translated_dialogue: Well, they're in for one nasty hangover! Our beloved Navy has come up with a high-tech new invention: trucks armed with HYPER-ELECTRICITY!!!

origin_dialogue: (When kidnapping children, do not harm the brains.)
translated_dialogue: (When kidnapping children, do not harm the brains.)

origin_dialogue: The destruction and terror continue as the hulking, godless child-beast carves a bloody swath through our helpless city.
translated_dialogue: The destruction and terror continue as the hulking, godless child-beast carves a bloody swath through our helpless city.

origin_dialogue: Our noble, all-volunteer Navy has been surprised only by the senseless lust for mayhem that seeps from the twisted, black lump of a heart in this creature, still known only as Goggalor.
translated_dialogue: Our noble, all-volunteer Navy has been surprised only by the senseless lust for mayhem that seeps from the twisted, black lump of a heart in this creature, still known only as Goggalor.

origin_dialogue: Though it loathes violence in all its forms, the Navy has no choice but to activate its Anti-Monster Turrets, which it guarantees are 100% monster proof.
translated_dialogue: Though it loathes violence in all its forms, the Navy has no choice but to activate its Anti-Monster Turrets, which it guarantees are 100% monster proof.

origin_dialogue: We're here with the star of the popular sitcom, "Trouble in the Bubble," Buddy Finn.
translated_dialogue: We're here with the star of the popular sitcom, "Trouble in the Bubble," Buddy Finn.

origin_dialogue: Buddy, what's your take on the Goggalor situation? Is he just misunderstood?
translated_dialogue: Buddy, what's your take on the Goggalor situation? Is he just misunderstood?

origin_dialogue: No way! I hate Goggalor! I can't imagine any one of my fans siding with the monster. He hates everything Lungfish care about--
translated_dialogue: No way! I hate Goggalor! I can't imagine any one of my fans siding with the monster. He hates everything Lungfish care about--

origin_dialogue: Buddy, you'll be happy to know that the Navy has decided to pull out what they're most famous for:
translated_dialogue: Buddy, you'll be happy to know that the Navy has decided to pull out what they're most famous for:

origin_dialogue: So, rest assured, we can all look forward to Goggalor's imminent death, and to seeing you, Buddy, every Thursday night at eight, right here on LBC!
translated_dialogue: So, rest assured, we can all look forward to Goggalor's imminent death, and to seeing you, Buddy, every Thursday night at eight, right here on LBC!

origin_dialogue: Thanks, and I'd just like to add that if anyone kidnaps a human child they should take them quickly under the lake to the abandoned insane asylum.
translated_dialogue: Thanks, and I'd just like to add that if anyone kidnaps a human child they should take them quickly under the lake to the abandoned insane asylum.

origin_dialogue: Well, we're sorry to report that the miserable and incompetent Lungfish Navy is all but sunk.
translated_dialogue: Well, we're sorry to report that the miserable and incompetent Lungfish Navy is all but sunk.

origin_dialogue: Now Kochamara himself will have to come all the way down here just to save our worthless hides.
translated_dialogue: Now Kochamara himself will have to come all the way down here just to save our worthless hides.

origin_dialogue: Authorities are calling for a big parade in Kochamara's honor after he clobbers the annoying giant Goggalor, and if the parade is big enough, Kochamara promises NOT to destroy the city.
translated_dialogue: Authorities are calling for a big parade in Kochamara's honor after he clobbers the annoying giant Goggalor, and if the parade is big enough, Kochamara promises NOT to destroy the city.

origin_dialogue: (Brush teeth more often. Don't drool so much.)
translated_dialogue: (Brush teeth more often. Don't drool so much.)

origin_dialogue: Goggalor, what are you doing down here?
translated_dialogue: Goggalor, what are you doing down here?

origin_dialogue: I'm trying to get to that Kochamara Tower thing so I can smash it.
translated_dialogue: I'm trying to get to that Kochamara Tower thing so I can smash it.

origin_dialogue: The laser tunnel, Goggalor. We have to get through that or we'll never get to Kochamara Island!
translated_dialogue: The laser tunnel, Goggalor. We have to get through that or we'll never get to Kochamara Island!

origin_dialogue: There is no "I" in team, Goggalor!
translated_dialogue: There is no "I" in team, Goggalor!

origin_dialogue: Yeah, but there's an "I" in "squish" so watch it.
translated_dialogue: Yeah, but there's an "I" in "squish" so watch it.

origin_dialogue: I'll go take out your laser tunnel, but then we're going to talk about who's running this revolution.
translated_dialogue: I'll go take out your laser tunnel, but then we're going to talk about who's running this revolution.

origin_dialogue: Goggalor! Another jail to smash! Take it out and free the prisoners, Goggalor!
translated_dialogue: Goggalor! Another jail to smash! Take it out and free the prisoners, Goggalor!

origin_dialogue: So this big monster, is that the best you could do?
translated_dialogue: So this big monster, is that the best you could do?

origin_dialogue: We were short on time, and he is good at smashing things!
translated_dialogue: We were short on time, and he is good at smashing things!

origin_dialogue: Doesn't look like much to me. Come on, let's blow this joint.
translated_dialogue: Doesn't look like much to me. Come on, let's blow this joint.

origin_dialogue: Sorry about him, Goggalor. He's been in prison a long time.
translated_dialogue: Sorry about him, Goggalor. He's been in prison a long time.

origin_dialogue: He's the only pilot the resistance has, and he has an excellent plan!
translated_dialogue: He's the only pilot the resistance has, and he has an excellent plan!

origin_dialogue: Meet us at the dam so we can put it into action!
translated_dialogue: Meet us at the dam so we can put it into action!

origin_dialogue: Ha! Now you see the genius of our plan, Goggalor!
translated_dialogue: Ha! Now you see the genius of our plan, Goggalor!

origin_dialogue: First, we print flyers. Then we spread them all over town with my blimp!
translated_dialogue: First, we print flyers. Then we spread them all over town with my blimp!

origin_dialogue: Winning over the hearts and minds of Lungfishopolis in as soon as six months.
translated_dialogue: Winning over the hearts and minds of Lungfishopolis in as soon as six months.

origin_dialogue: You don't like our plan, you can come up with another one!
translated_dialogue: You don't like our plan, you can come up with another one!

origin_dialogue: Yes, we are busy! We have to select card stock, and then find a decent, but inexpensive printer within the week.
translated_dialogue: Yes, we are busy! We have to select card stock, and then find a decent, but inexpensive printer within the week.

origin_dialogue: Hey, what are you doing up there?
translated_dialogue: Hey, what are you doing up there?

origin_dialogue: We don't have a replacement blimp, you know!
translated_dialogue: We don't have a replacement blimp, you know!

origin_dialogue: Have you come up with a better plan than the pamphlets yet?
translated_dialogue: Have you come up with a better plan than the pamphlets yet?

origin_dialogue: Yes, it's called "Turn in Goggalor for Reward Money."
translated_dialogue: Yes, it's called "Turn in Goggalor for Reward Money."

origin_dialogue: Hey, you guys still in there? It's Goggalor!
translated_dialogue: Hey, you guys still in there? It's Goggalor!

origin_dialogue: Oh, this guy. Just ignore him. He'll go away.
translated_dialogue: Oh, this guy. Just ignore him. He'll go away.

origin_dialogue: The thing is that, uh, although we have the utmost faith that you will soon contain the area, Goggalor we... uh
translated_dialogue: The thing is that, uh, although we have the utmost faith that you will soon contain the area, Goggalor we... uh

origin_dialogue: Give up while you can, Goggalor!
translated_dialogue: Give up while you can, Goggalor!

origin_dialogue: I know it's you in there, Coach! I don't know where you're broadcasting from, but I'm going to find out and make you show me what happened to Lili.
translated_dialogue: I know it's you in there, Coach! I don't know where you're broadcasting from, but I'm going to find out and make you show me what happened to Lili.

origin_dialogue: Kochamara does not speak giant monster boy language.
translated_dialogue: Kochamara does not speak giant monster boy language.

origin_dialogue: The only word you're going to need is "Ouch."
translated_dialogue: The only word you're going to need is "Ouch."

origin_dialogue: Hmm. So Sasha's showed you how to save up your aggressive energy, huh?
translated_dialogue: Hmm. So Sasha's showed you how to save up your aggressive energy, huh?

origin_dialogue: Well, why don't I help you
translated_dialogue: Well, why don't I help you

origin_dialogue: Whaddya going to do now, eh?
translated_dialogue: Whaddya going to do now, eh?

origin_dialogue: I'm nothing without my cheater PSI Blast!
translated_dialogue: I'm nothing without my cheater PSI Blast!

origin_dialogue: Oh, Sasha, Sasha. Come help me.
translated_dialogue: Oh, Sasha, Sasha. Come help me.

origin_dialogue: I have no defenses of my own!
translated_dialogue: I have no defenses of my own!

origin_dialogue: Give up Coach. I'm sure the Psychonauts are on their way from HQ right now to bust you.
translated_dialogue: Give up Coach. I'm sure the Psychonauts are on their way from HQ right now to bust you.

origin_dialogue: Sorry, but I was made senior facility officer this year, and the senior facility officer has notified HQ that everything is peachy at Camp Whispering Rock!
translated_dialogue: Sorry, but I was made senior facility officer this year, and the senior facility officer has notified HQ that everything is peachy at Camp Whispering Rock!

origin_dialogue: Okay, tower. Get ready for Goggalor!
translated_dialogue: Okay, tower. Get ready for Goggalor!

origin_dialogue: Goggalor, you did it! You defeated Kochamara!
translated_dialogue: Goggalor, you did it! You defeated Kochamara!

origin_dialogue: Yep. Now we can find out where Lili went.
translated_dialogue: Yep. Now we can find out where Lili went.

origin_dialogue: Not yet. The tower is still broadcasting its mind control over the populace!
translated_dialogue: Not yet. The tower is still broadcasting its mind control over the populace!

origin_dialogue: Right. Man, Goggalor needs a sidekick or a PA or something.
translated_dialogue: Right. Man, Goggalor needs a sidekick or a PA or something.

origin_dialogue: Well, he was evil. But he did build a lot of roads.
translated_dialogue: Well, he was evil. But he did build a lot of roads.

origin_dialogue: Hey, shouldn't this place be much quieter now that Kochamara's gone?
translated_dialogue: Hey, shouldn't this place be much quieter now that Kochamara's gone?

origin_dialogue: Well, there's still some crazy Navy guys who haven't realized that the war is over. But--we got 'em on the run I think.
translated_dialogue: Well, there's still some crazy Navy guys who haven't realized that the war is over. But--we got 'em on the run I think.

origin_dialogue: Got some really aggressive flyers at the printer right now. Should sway popular opinion our way in no time.
translated_dialogue: Got some really aggressive flyers at the printer right now. Should sway popular opinion our way in no time.

origin_dialogue: So you don't mind if I smash up some more tanks and planes and stuff?
translated_dialogue: So you don't mind if I smash up some more tanks and planes and stuff?

origin_dialogue: Goggalor, you may smash it all! This whole area is scheduled for reforestation.
translated_dialogue: Goggalor, you may smash it all! This whole area is scheduled for reforestation.

origin_dialogue: Kochamara built this city for us. Lungfish weren't meant to live in cities!
translated_dialogue: Kochamara built this city for us. Lungfish weren't meant to live in cities!

origin_dialogue: Well, okay then. I'll bet I can save you a bit on the demolition costs.
translated_dialogue: Well, okay then. I'll bet I can save you a bit on the demolition costs.

origin_dialogue: Yeah, go nuts! You can squish people too if you want. My family lives in a whole other town.
translated_dialogue: Yeah, go nuts! You can squish people too if you want. My family lives in a whole other town.

origin_dialogue: Use your PSYCHIC SHIELD to protect you from damage, and reflect SOME enemy attacks back at the attacker! NOTE: You will not be able to maintain a PSYCHIC SHIELD forever, and when this part of your mind is exhausted, you will need to wait a while before you use it again.
translated_dialogue: Use your PSYCHIC SHIELD to protect you from damage, and reflect SOME enemy attacks back at the attacker! NOTE: You will not be able to maintain a PSYCHIC SHIELD forever, and when this part of your mind is exhausted, you will need to wait a while before you use it again.
